pullrequest.title: Change ign-math detection in sdformat windows build

content.raw:
This last approach seems more useful with the Dirk idea in mind. I made this:

* sdf4: Detection code seems to work but we don't support the testing  with sdf4 and current release-tools so [it's failing because of the  ign-math version](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/441/consoleFull#-16983396860c2a1a78-bdb9-40ef-a36b-a7ae9c661886)
* sdf5: [seems ok](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/440/)
content.html:
This last approach seems more useful with the Dirk idea in mind. I made this:

  • sdf4: Detection code seems to work but we don't support the testing with sdf4 and current release-tools so it's failing because of the ign-math version
  • sdf5: seems ok
